name: Manx Telecom
overview:
Manx Telecom Limited provides telecommunications and Internet services in the United Kingdom. It offers fixed line, mobile, and data services to consumers and businesses. The company provides mobile services, such as BlackBerry enterprise email solutions, multimedia messaging, short message service, mobile data, mobile data devices, and mobile roaming services. Its home phone services include voicemail, call return, ring back tones, call waiting, caller display, short code calling, remote activation of call diversion, reminder call, and call diversion services. The company also offers broadband, dial up, and Web hosting services. In addition, it provides mobile solutions, group calls, fixed line, and ISDN services for businesses. The company offers data centre, managed services, connectivity, and security telephony services. Further, it operates an online shop to sell mobile products.

The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Braddan, the United Kingdom. Manx Telecom Limited operates as subsidiary of O2 Netherland Holdings B.V.
